# Hail of Stone (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]]) \[[[Earth Spells|earth]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[Stone (Domain)|Stone 2]], [[1st Level Warmage Spells|Warmage 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]], [[1st Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, M (a piece of jade worth at least 5 gp)

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Area:** Cylinder (5-ft. radius, 40 ft. high)

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 108

*You hold the jade chip before you and blow on it as you end the spell. The chip flares with a green flame and vanishes as rocks begin to fall on your pursuers*.

You create a rain of stones that deals 1d4 points of damage per caster level (maximum 5d4) to creatures and objects within the area.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Stone 2 to Level per Oriental Adventures.

*House Rule:* Added Warmage 1, Wu jen 1  per Complete Arcane.
